name: G.L.I.C.
description:
This is a game that lets you walk around while taking avoiding natural disasters and stay alive as long as possible.  At the moment, the game still has only meteors for you to dodge. But we will definitely add something else in the future.  Please wait for everyone to follow.

If you have any suggestions or reporting errors please report them in the comment. We will fix it as soon as possible. 

Hope you have a wonderful experience playing our game.Thank you :3
